province_event = { #Gifted catholic
	
	id = dg_minorities.001
	title = dg_minorities.001.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 20 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 50 } }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = catholic
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = catholic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = catholic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_fortification_expert
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = catholic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_diplomat
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = catholic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = catholic
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_catholic
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = catholic
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = catholic culture = ROOT type = fortification_expert discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = catholic culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = catholic culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = dg_minorities.002

	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority

				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { protestant = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}

				owner = { protestant = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}

				owner = { protestant = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}

				owner = { NOT = { protestant = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7

				factor = 0.7
			}

			}

				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }

			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }

				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = protestant } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_quartermaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = protestant } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_trader
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = protestant } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_natural_scientist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = protestant
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_protestant
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = protestant
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = protestant culture = ROOT type = quartermaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = protestant culture = ROOT type = trader discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = protestant culture = ROOT type = natural_scientist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = dg_minorities.003

				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {

				factor = 1.2

			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { orthodox = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { orthodox = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 20 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 50 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = orthodox
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = orthodox } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = orthodox } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_army_organiser
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = orthodox } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_spymaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = orthodox } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = orthodox
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_orthodox
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = orthodox
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = orthodox culture = ROOT type = army_organiser discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = orthodox culture = ROOT type = spymaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = orthodox culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #Gifted reformed
	
	id = dg_minorities.004
	title = dg_minorities.004.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = reformed_advisors
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						50 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						50 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises

			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }

				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}

		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 20 } } #culture = ROOT #Pacifist
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = gnostic culture = ROOT type = fortification_expert discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = gnostic culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = gnostic culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #Gifted coptic Orthodox
	
	id = dg_minorities.006
	title = dg_minorities.006.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { coptic = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { coptic = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = coptic
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = coptic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = coptic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = coptic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_philosopher
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = coptic } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_navigator
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = coptic
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_coptic
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = coptic
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = coptic culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = coptic culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = coptic culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sunni } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sunni } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sunni } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_natural_scientist
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sunni } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_trader
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = sunni
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_sunni
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = sunni
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = sunni culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = sunni culture = ROOT type = trader discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = sunni culture = ROOT type = natural_scientist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #Gifted shiite
	
	id = dg_minorities.009
	title = dg_minorities.009.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = muslim_minority_advisor
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			#Warlike religion
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						10 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shiite = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shiite = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = shiite
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shiite } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shiite } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_quartermaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shiite } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_spymaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shiite } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = shiite
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_shiite
			}
		}
		#Minority may grow in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = shiite
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = shiite culture = ROOT type = quartermaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = shiite culture = ROOT type = spymaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = shiite culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { wahhabi = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { wahhabi = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { wahhabi = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { wahhabi = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { wahhabi = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = wahhabi
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = wahhabi } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = wahhabi } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = wahhabi } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_trader
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = wahhabi } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_treasurer
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = wahhabi
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_wahhabi
			}
		}
		#Minority may grow in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = wahhabi
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = wahhabi culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = wahhabi culture = ROOT type = trader discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = wahhabi culture = ROOT type = treasurer discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #Gifted buddhism
	
	id = dg_minorities.012
	title = dg_minorities.012.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = buddhist_monks
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			#Pacifist religion
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						30 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						10 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate

		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = confucianism culture = ROOT type = army_organiser discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = confucianism culture = ROOT type = spymaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = confucianism culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #Gifted Mahayana
	
	id = dg_minorities.014
	title = dg_minorities.014.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = buddhist_monks
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			#Warlike religion
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						10 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mahayana = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mahayana = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mahayana = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mahayana = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mahayana = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises XXX
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = mahayana
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = mahayana } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = mahayana } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_fortification_expert
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = mahayana } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_spymaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = mahayana } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = mahayana
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_mahayana
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = mahayana
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = mahayana culture = ROOT type = fortification_expert discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = mahayana culture = ROOT type = spymaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = mahayana culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = hinduism } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = hinduism } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_navigator
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = hinduism } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = hinduism
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_hinduism
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = hinduism
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = hinduism culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = hinduism culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = hinduism culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #Gifted sikhism
	
	id = dg_minorities.017
	title = dg_minorities.017.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = sikhism_guru
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			#Warlike religion
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						10 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated } }
				NOT = { religion_years = { sikhism = 60 } }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted }
				religion_years = { sikhism = 60 }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { sikhism = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { sikhism = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { sikhism = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { sikhism = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { sikhism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted }
				religion_years = { sikhism = 60 }
			}
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = sikhism
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sikhism } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sikhism } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sikhism } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_diplomat
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = sikhism } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_philosopher
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = sikhism
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_sikhism
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = sikhism
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = sikhism culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = sikhism culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = sikhism culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { zoroastrian = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { zoroastrian = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { zoroastrian = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { zoroastrian = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { zoroastrian = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = zoroastrian
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = zoroastrian } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = zoroastrian } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = zoroastrian } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_diplomat
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = zoroastrian } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_treasurer
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = zoroastrian
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_zoroastrian
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = zoroastrian
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = zoroastrian culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = zoroastrian culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = zoroastrian culture = ROOT type = treasurer discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes

					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }

					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }

			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = trader discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #Gifted inti
	
	id = dg_minorities.022
	title = dg_minorities.022.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { inti = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { inti = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { inti = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { inti = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { inti = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises XXX
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = inti
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = inti } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = inti } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_fortification_expert
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = inti } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_diplomat
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = inti } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_natural_scientist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = inti
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_inti
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = inti
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = inti culture = ROOT type = fortification_expert discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = inti culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = inti culture = ROOT type = natural_scientist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
