				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_army_organiser
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_navigator
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_philosopher
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_tengri_pagan_reformed
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = army_organiser discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #Gifted nahuatl
	
	id = dg_minorities.025
	title = dg_minorities.025.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			#Warlike religion
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						10 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { nahuatl = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { nahuatl = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { nahuatl = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { nahuatl = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { nahuatl = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises XXX
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = nahuatl
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = nahuatl } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = nahuatl } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = nahuatl } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_navigator
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = nahuatl } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_treasurer
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = nahuatl
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_nahuatl
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = nahuatl
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = nahuatl culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = nahuatl culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = nahuatl culture = ROOT type = treasurer discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {

				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}

			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {

	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises XXX
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = polynesian_religion } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = polynesian_religion } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = polynesian_religion } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_navigator
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = polynesian_religion } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_natural_scientist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_polynesian_religion
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = polynesian_religion culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = polynesian_religion culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = polynesian_religion culture = ROOT type = natural_scientist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #Gifted norse_pagan_reformed
	
	id = dg_minorities.028
	title = dg_minorities.028.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			#Warlike religion
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						10 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { norse_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { norse_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { norse_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { norse_pagan_reformed = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { norse_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises XXX
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }

				factor = 0.7

			hidden_effect = {

				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = quartermaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = trader discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}

		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = adi_dharam culture = ROOT type = quartermaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = adi_dharam culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = adi_dharam culture = ROOT type = natural_scientist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #Gifted hellenic_pagan
	
	id = dg_minorities.030
	title = dg_minorities.030.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = hellenic_philosophy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hellenic_pagan = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hellenic_pagan = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hellenic_pagan = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hellenic_pagan = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hellenic_pagan = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = hellenic_pagan } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = hellenic_pagan } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_fortification_expert
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = hellenic_pagan } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_diplomat
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = hellenic_pagan } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_philosopher
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_hellenic_pagan
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = hellenic_pagan culture = ROOT type = fortification_expert discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = hellenic_pagan culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = hellenic_pagan culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_quartermaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_navigator
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_natural_scientist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_finnish_pagan_reformed
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = quartermaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = natural_scientist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #Gifted slavic_pagan_reformed
	
	id = dg_minorities.033
	title = dg_minorities.033.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { slavic_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { slavic_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { slavic_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { slavic_pagan_reformed = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { slavic_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_diplomat
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_slavic_pagan_reformed
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

					random_list = {
						25 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						25 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						40 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = chaldean
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = chaldean } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = chaldean } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_quartermaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = chaldean } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_trader
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = chaldean } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = chaldean
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_chaldean
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = chaldean
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 30 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = chaldean culture = ROOT type = quartermaster discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = chaldean culture = ROOT type = trader discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = chaldean culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #Gifted Druze

		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_mesoamerican_religion
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = mesoamerican_religion
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = mesoamerican_religion culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = mesoamerican_religion culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = mesoamerican_religion culture = ROOT type = treasurer discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #Gifted shinto
	
	id = dg_minorities.038
	title = dg_minorities.038.t
	desc = dg_minorities.001.d
	picture = all_talented_minority #TEMP
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			#Determines type of advisor semi-randomly depending on circumstances
			#Warlike religion
			if = { #War is going badly
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						war_exhaustion = 4
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #War is going well
				limit = {
					owner = {
						is_at_war = yes
						NOT = { war_exhaustion = 4 }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = leader_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						20 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						10 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
			if = { #The country is at peace
				limit = { owner = { is_at_war = no } }
				owner = {
					random_list = {
						40 = { set_country_flag = military_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = administrative_advisor }
						30 = { set_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		} #Ends hidden
	} #Ends immediate
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.a #Only $COUNTRY_RELIGION$s are welcome in $CAPITAL$
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 5 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } }
				factor = 1.2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_tolerance value = 9 } } }
				factor = 0.8
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shinto = 3 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shinto = 2 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shinto = 1 }
				factor = 1.1
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shinto = 1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shinto = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = shinto
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
			clr_country_flag = military_advisor
			clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
			clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
		}
		#Advisor goes elsewhere if he can
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shinto } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shinto } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_fortification_expert
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shinto } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_spymaster
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			random_neighbor_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { owned_by = ROOT } owner = { religion = shinto } }
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.040 days = 30 }
					set_country_flag = advisor_artist
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.001.b #There is always room for talented men
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 70 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 50 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { legitimacy = 90 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = shinto
		}
		owner = {
			custom_tooltip = useful_minority
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
				set_country_flag = useful_shinto
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = shinto
		}
		#Displeases your court
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -5
				add_legitimacy = -10
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = 0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2.5
				add_legitimacy = -5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.20 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -1
				add_legitimacy = -2.5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { owner = { piety = -0.60 } }
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -0.5
				add_legitimacy = -1
			}
		}
		#Gives you a free advisor
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = leader_advisor } }
			owner = { create_general = { tradition = 40 } } #culture = ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = military_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = shinto culture = ROOT type = commandant discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = shinto culture = ROOT type = statesman discount = yes } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = administrative_advisor } }
			owner = { define_advisor = { religion = shinto culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes } }
		}
		owner = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = leader_advisor
				clr_country_flag = military_advisor
				clr_country_flag = diplomatic_advisor
				clr_country_flag = administrative_advisor
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Talented $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ man
	
	id = dg_minorities.040
	title = dg_minorities.040.t
	desc = dg_minorities.040.d
	picture = all_talented_minority
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.040.a
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_observant }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_decadent }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_general }
			create_general = { tradition = 30 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_general_strong }
			create_general = { tradition = 40 culture = ROOT }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_general_weak }
			create_general = { tradition = 20 culture = ROOT }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_philosopher }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = philosopher discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_natural_scientist }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = natural_scientist discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_artist }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = artist discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_treasurer }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = treasurer discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_trader }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = trader discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_spymaster }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = spymaster discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_diplomat }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = diplomat discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_navigator }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = navigator discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_quartermaster }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = quartermaster discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_fortification_expert }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = fortification_expert discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = grand_captain discount = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = advisor_army_organiser }
			define_advisor = { religion = ROOT culture = ROOT type = army_organiser discount = yes }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			#leader
			clr_country_flag = advisor_general
			clr_country_flag = advisor_general_strong
			clr_country_flag = advisor_general_weak
			#military
			clr_country_flag = advisor_quartermaster
			clr_country_flag = advisor_fortification_expert
			clr_country_flag = advisor_grand_captain
			clr_country_flag = advisor_army_organiser
			#administrative
			clr_country_flag = advisor_philosopher
			clr_country_flag = advisor_natural_scientist
			clr_country_flag = advisor_artist
			clr_country_flag = advisor_treasurer
			#diplomatic
			clr_country_flag = advisor_trader
			clr_country_flag = advisor_spymaster
			clr_country_flag = advisor_diplomat
			clr_country_flag = advisor_navigator
		}
	}
}

####################
# MINORITY TEMPLES #
####################

province_event = { #a catholic temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.041
	title = dg_minorities.041.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 20 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 50 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = catholic
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = catholic
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { catholic = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { catholic = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = catholic
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = catholic
		}
	}
}

			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { orthodox = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { orthodox = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { orthodox = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { orthodox = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { orthodox = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { orthodox = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = orthodox
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = orthodox
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #a reformed temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.044
	title = dg_minorities.044.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = reformed value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = reformed value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = reformed
		}
	}
}
