		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = coptic
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { coptic = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { coptic = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { coptic = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { coptic = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { coptic = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { coptic = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = coptic
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = coptic
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #a hussite temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.047
	title = dg_minorities.047.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hussite value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hussite value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = hussite
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = hussite
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hussite = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hussite = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = hussite
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = hussite
		}
	}
}

			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = shiite value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority may grow in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = shiite
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shiite = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shiite = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { shiite = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shiite = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shiite = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { shiite = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = shiite
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority may grow in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = shiite
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #a ibadi temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.050
	title = dg_minorities.050.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = muslim_mosque
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { ibadi = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { ibadi = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { ibadi = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { ibadi = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { ibadi = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { ibadi = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = ibadi
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { ibadi = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { ibadi = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { ibadi = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { ibadi = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { ibadi = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { ibadi = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ibadi value = 4 } }

				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = buddhism value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority may grow in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = buddhism
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { buddhism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { buddhism = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = buddhism
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority may grow in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = buddhism
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #a confucianism temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.053
	title = dg_minorities.053.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { confucianism = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { confucianism = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { confucianism = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { confucianism = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { confucianism = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { confucianism = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = confucianism
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { confucianism = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { confucianism = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { confucianism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { confucianism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { confucianism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { confucianism = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = confucianism value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = confucianism
		}
	}
	option = {

		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = vajrayana
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = buddhists_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = vajrayana value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = vajrayana
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { vajrayana = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { vajrayana = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = vajrayana
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = vajrayana
		}
	}
}

				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jain value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jain value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted }
				religion_years = { sikhism = 60 }
			}
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = jain
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jain value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = jain
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jain = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jain = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = jain
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = jain
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {

		}

province_event = { #a west_african_pagan_reformed temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.061
	title = dg_minorities.061.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { west_african_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
}

				owner = { totemism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { totemism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { totemism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { totemism = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { totemism = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { totemism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { totemism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { totemism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { totemism = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = totemism
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = totemism
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #a tengri_pagan_reformed temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.064
	title = dg_minorities.064.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect_weak = {
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { tengri_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
	}

				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Increases this minority in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = jewish
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jewish = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jewish = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jewish = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jewish = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jewish = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jewish = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jewish = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { jewish = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jewish = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jewish = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { jewish = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = jewish
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Increases this minority in some cases
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = jewish
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #a polynesian_religion temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.067
	title = dg_minorities.067.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = polynesian_religion value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = polynesian_religion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { polynesian_religion = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { polynesian_religion = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = polynesian_religion
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = polynesian_religion
		}
	}

					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = adi_dharam value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = adi_dharam
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { adi_dharam = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { adi_dharam = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = adi_dharam
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = adi_dharam
		}
	}
}
province_event = { #a hellenic_pagan temple for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.070
	title = dg_minorities.070.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hellenic_pagan = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hellenic_pagan = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { hellenic_pagan = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hellenic_pagan = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hellenic_pagan = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { hellenic_pagan = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4

				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 8 }

				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { NOT = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = finnish_pagan_reformed value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { finnish_pagan_reformed = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
}

		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { pantheism = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { pantheism = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { pantheism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { pantheism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { pantheism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { pantheism = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { pantheism = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { pantheism = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { pantheism = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { pantheism = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { pantheism = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = pantheism
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = pantheism
		}
	}
}

province_event = { #a Chaldean church for $PROVINCENAME$
	
	id = dg_minorities.075
	title = dg_minorities.075.t
	desc = dg_minorities.041.d
	picture = religion_temple_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.a #Refuse to give them permission
		trigger = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 3 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 1 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = 0 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -1 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -2 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 4 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 6 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 8 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		#Displeases this minority
		displease_minority_effect = {
			religion = chaldean
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				}
				add_piety = 0.20
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				add_piety = 0.40
				remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 500 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.b #Allow it to be built
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated }
				factor = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 10 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { treasury = 25 } }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { num_of_loans = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { is_bankrupt = yes }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = chaldean
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { chaldean = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { chaldean = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = chaldean
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = chaldean
		}
	}
}

			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mesoamerican_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mesoamerican_religion = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		#Broken promises
		if = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = new_world_pagans_tolerated } }
			custom_tooltip = broken_minority_promise
			owner = {
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
				add_republican_tradition = -2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 10 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 25 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 8 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 20 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 6 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 15 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 4 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 10 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = mesoamerican_religion value = 2 } }
			owner = { add_treasury = 5 }
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = mesoamerican_religion
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.041.c #Give state support
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				has_owner_religion = no
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				unrest = 5
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mesoamerican_religion = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mesoamerican_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { mesoamerican_religion = 1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mesoamerican_religion = 0 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mesoamerican_religion = -1 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				owner = { NOT = { mesoamerican_religion = -2 } }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		owner = {
			add_treasury = -10
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		#Pleases this minority
		please_minority_effect = {
			religion = mesoamerican_religion
		}
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
				remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance } }
				add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 500 }
				add_piety = -0.20
			}
		}
		#Increase minority if it is a minority in the province (no effect if it is the majority already)
		minority_grows_effect = {
			religion = mesoamerican_religion
		}
	}
}
