################################
# Minority Conversion Decision #
################################

# Note, the treasury cost used to be scaled by minority size in fixed intervals, now its a single interval. Could use POP data instead, would be better.

country_event = { #99 - Conversion of heretics
	
	id = dg_minorities.099
	title = dg_minorities.099.t
	desc = dg_minorities.099.d
	picture = all_mission
	
	is_triggered_only = yes #By decision
	
	immediate = { }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.099.a #No
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.099.e_heretic
		ai_chance = { factor = 80 }
		trigger = {
			any_owned_province = {
				is_city = yes
				has_owner_religion = yes
				check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 }
				controlled_by = owner
				has_siege = no
				is_core = ROOT
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = conversion_tensions }
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = minority_missionary }
				NOT = { has_province_flag = anti_heretic_missionary }
			}
		}
		add_treasury = -10
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				is_city = yes
				has_owner_religion = yes
				check_variable = { which = heretics value = 2 }
				controlled_by = owner
				has_siege = no
				is_core = ROOT
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = conversion_tensions }
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = minority_missionary }
				NOT = { has_province_flag = anti_heretic_missionary }
			}
			add_province_modifier = { name = minority_missionary duration = 2000 }
			set_province_flag = anti_heretic_missionary
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.099.e_catholic
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				catholic = 1
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				catholic = 0
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				any_rival_country = { religion = catholic }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 8 }
					has_owner_religion = yes
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 }
					has_owner_religion = yes
				}
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				any_owned_province = {
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
					has_owner_religion = yes
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		trigger = {

##############################
# Minority business contacts #
##############################

country_event = { #Catholic Contacts
	
	id = dg_minorities.101
	title = dg_minorities.101.t
	desc = dg_minorities.101.d
	picture = religion_bazaar
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.a #Issue a letter of protection to them
		trigger = { catholic = -3 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				catholic = 3
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				catholic = 1
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = 0 }
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -2 }
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = useful_minority
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_catholic
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 10 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 20
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 8 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 16
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 12
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 8
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 4
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		minority_grows_country_effect = {
			religion = catholic
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.c #Demand a tax from them
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				catholic = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				catholic = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = 0 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = useful_minority
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_catholic
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 10 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 25
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 10
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 8 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }

				}

					power = 8
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 15
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier

						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 6
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 4
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 5
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 50 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = catholic
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #reformed Contacts
	
	id = dg_minorities.104
	title = dg_minorities.104.t
	desc = dg_minorities.101.d
	picture = religion_bazaar
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.a #Issue a letter of protection to them
		trigger = { reformed = -3 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				reformed = 3
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				reformed = 1
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { reformed = 0 }
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { reformed = -2 }
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = useful_minority
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 10 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 20
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 8 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 16
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 6 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {

					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 12
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {

						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {

				add_trade_modifier = {

					power = 8
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {

						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 4
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		#Minority grows in some cases
		minority_grows_country_effect = {
			religion = reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.c #Demand a tax from them
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				reformed = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				reformed = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}

				NOT = { reformed = 0 }
				factor = 0.7

			}
			add_treasury = 25
			random_active_trade_node = {

				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root

					power = 6
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 4 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }

		}

			}

			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }

					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }

				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7

				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }

			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = reformed
		}
	}
}

				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 10 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 25
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 10
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 8 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 8
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 6 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 15
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 6
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 4 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 4
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 5
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = coptic value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = coptic
		}
	}
}

		}
	}
}

							check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 10
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 8 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 8
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 6 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 15
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 6
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 4 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 4
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 5
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = wahhabi
		}
	}
}

					power = 10
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 8 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 8
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 6 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 15
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 6
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 4
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 5
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = west_african_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10

			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
}

							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 10
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 8 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 8
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 6 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 15
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier

						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 6
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 4 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 4
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 5
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = jewish value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = jews_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = jewish
		}
	}
}

				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 2 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 5
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = slavic_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
	}
}

				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = shinto value = 2 } }
			}
			add_treasury = 5
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = shinto value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 2
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.b #Create obstacles to trade
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = pagans_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		add_dip_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1.5
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_legitimacy = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_legitimacy = 0.5
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect = {
			religion = shinto
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #shamanism Contacts
	
	id = dg_minorities.139
	title = dg_minorities.139.t
	desc = dg_minorities.101.d
	picture = religion_bazaar
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.101.a #Issue a letter of protection to them
		trigger = { shamanism = -3 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				shamanism = 3
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				shamanism = 1
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { shamanism = 0 }
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { shamanism = -2 }
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = useful_minority
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_shamanism
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = shamanism value = 10 } }
			}
			random_active_trade_node = {
				limit = {
					strongest_trade_power = {
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						any_owned_province = {
							has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
							check_variable = { which = shamanism value = 2 }
						}
					}
				}
				add_trade_modifier = {
					who = root
					duration = 2000
					power = 20
					key = minority_contacts
				}
			}
		}

country_event = { #Catholic scapegoats
	
	id = dg_minorities.151
	title = dg_minorities.151.t
	desc = dg_minorities.151.d
	picture = turmoil_pogrom
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = minority_scapegoat #Once per ruler
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.a #Lead a pogrom personally
		trigger = {
			piety = -0.20
			NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_permitted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 90 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 80 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 70 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 60 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 90 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 80 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 4
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 8
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 12
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 16
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 50 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 30 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -10
		dg_add_intolerance_long = yes
		dg_add_legitimacy_large = yes
		dg_reduce_exhaustion = yes
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 5 }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 4 NOT = { ADM = 5 } }
			random = { chance = 80 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 3 NOT = { ADM = 4 } }
			random = { chance = 60 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 3 } }
			random = { chance = 40 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect_expulsion = {
			religion = catholic
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.b #Turn a blind eye to the persecution
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = christians_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		dg_add_intolerance = yes
		displease_minority_country_effect_strong = {
			religion = catholic
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.c #Send in the army to restore order
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 10 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 20 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 30 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 40 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 50 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = 0 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -3 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = protecting_minority
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 15 }
			set_country_flag = useful_catholic
		}
		add_mil_power = -10
		dg_add_tolerance = yes
	}
}

		}

			modifier = {
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 90 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 80 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 70 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 60 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 90 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 80 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 4
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 8
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 12
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 16
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 50 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 30 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -10
		dg_add_intolerance_long = yes
		dg_add_legitimacy_large = yes
		dg_reduce_exhaustion = yes
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 5 }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 4 NOT = { ADM = 5 } }
			random = { chance = 80 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 3 NOT = { ADM = 4 } }
			random = { chance = 60 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 3 } }
			random = { chance = 40 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect_expulsion = {
			religion = sunni
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.b #Turn a blind eye to the persecution
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = muslims_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		dg_add_intolerance = yes
		displease_minority_country_effect_strong = {
			religion = sunni
		}
	}
	option = {

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 10 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 20 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 30 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 40 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sunni_population value = 50 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sunni = 0 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sunni = -2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sunni = -3 }
				factor = 0
			}

country_event = { #sikhism scapegoats
	
	id = dg_minorities.167
	title = dg_minorities.167.t
	desc = dg_minorities.151.d
	picture = turmoil_pogrom
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = { set_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.a #Lead a pogrom personally
		trigger = {
			piety = -0.20
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = dharmics_permitted }
				NOT = { religion_years = { sikhism = 60 } }
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 90 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 80 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 70 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 60 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 90 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 80 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 4
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 8
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 12
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 16
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 50 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 30 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -10
		dg_add_intolerance_long = yes
		dg_add_legitimacy_large = yes
		dg_reduce_exhaustion = yes
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 5 }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 4 NOT = { ADM = 5 } }
			random = { chance = 80 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 3 NOT = { ADM = 4 } }
			random = { chance = 60 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 3 } }
			random = { chance = 40 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect_expulsion = {
			religion = sikhism
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.b #Turn a blind eye to the persecution
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = dharmics_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		dg_add_intolerance = yes
		displease_minority_country_effect_strong = {
			religion = sikhism
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.c #Send in the army to restore order
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 10 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 20 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 30 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 40 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = sikhism_population value = 50 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sikhism = 0 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sikhism = -2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sikhism = -3 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = protecting_minority
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 15 }
			set_country_flag = useful_sikhism
		}
		add_mil_power = -10
		dg_add_tolerance = yes
	}
}

	immediate = { set_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
	
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.a #Lead a pogrom personally
		trigger = {
			piety = -0.20
			NOT = { has_country_flag = jews_permitted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 90 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 80 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 70 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 60 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 90 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 80 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 4
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 8
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 12
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 16
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 50 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 30 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -10
		dg_add_intolerance_long = yes
		dg_add_legitimacy_large = yes
		dg_reduce_exhaustion = yes
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 5 }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 4 NOT = { ADM = 5 } }
			random = { chance = 80 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 3 NOT = { ADM = 4 } }
			random = { chance = 60 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 3 } }
			random = { chance = 40 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect_expulsion = {
			religion = jewish
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.b #Turn a blind eye to the persecution
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = jews_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		dg_add_intolerance = yes
		displease_minority_country_effect_strong = {
			religion = jewish
		}

				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 30 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 40 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = jewish_population value = 50 }

		name = dg_minorities.151.a #Lead a pogrom personally
		trigger = {
			piety = -0.20
			NOT = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_permitted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.60
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 90 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 80 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 70 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { legitimacy = 60 }
				government = monarchy
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 90 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { republican_tradition = 80 }
				government = republic
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 4
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 8
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 12
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 16
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 50 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 30 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 20 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 10 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		add_adm_power = -10
		dg_add_intolerance_long = yes
		dg_add_legitimacy_large = yes
		dg_reduce_exhaustion = yes
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 5 }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 4 NOT = { ADM = 5 } }
			random = { chance = 80 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { ADM = 3 NOT = { ADM = 4 } }
			random = { chance = 60 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { ADM = 3 } }
			random = { chance = 40 add_stability_1 = yes }
		}
		displease_minority_country_effect_expulsion = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.b #Turn a blind eye to the persecution
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = european_pagans_tolerated } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		dg_add_intolerance = yes
		displease_minority_country_effect_strong = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_minorities.151.c #Send in the army to restore order
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 10 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 20 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 30 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 40 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = hellenic_pagan_population value = 50 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { hellenic_pagan = 0 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { hellenic_pagan = -2 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { hellenic_pagan = -3 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = protecting_minority
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 15 }
			set_country_flag = useful_hellenic_pagan
		}
		add_mil_power = -10
		dg_add_tolerance = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #301 - Catholic Timer
	
	id = dg_minorities.301
	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d
	picture = ai_only
	
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { religion = catholic } }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
				any_owned_province = {
					has_owner_culture = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
					is_core = ROOT
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
				}
				NOT = { catholic = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
					OR = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { stability = 0 }
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = 15
					clr_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.151 days = 30 random = 180 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
						OR = {
							piety = -0.20
							NOT = { stability = -1 }
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 15
						clr_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.151 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
							OR = {
								piety = 0.20
								NOT = { stability = -2 }
							}
						}
						random = {
							chance = 15
							clr_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.151 days = 30 random = 180 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
								piety = 0.60
							}
							random = {
								chance = 15
								clr_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
								country_event = { id = dg_minorities.151 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #Generic events
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
				NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic }
				catholic = -3
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			}
			clr_country_flag = catholic_minority_event
			random_list = {
				35 = { #Advisor
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										catholic = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = catholic } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.001 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.001 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.001 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.001 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.001 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				35 = { #Trade
					if = {
						limit = {
							any_active_trade_node = {
								strongest_trade_power = {
									NOT = { tag = ROOT }
									any_owned_province = {
										has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
										check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.101 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
				}
				30 = { #Temple
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										catholic = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = catholic } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
										controlled_by = owner
									}
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.041 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.041 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.041 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 }
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.041 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = catholic value = 4 }
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.041 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	
	option = {
		name = ai_only.a
	}
}

country_event = { #304 - reformed Timer
	
	id = dg_minorities.304
	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d
	picture = ai_only
	
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { religion = reformed } }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
				any_owned_province = {
					has_owner_culture = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
					is_core = ROOT
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
				}
				NOT = { reformed = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
					OR = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { stability = 0 }
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = 15
					clr_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.154 days = 30 random = 180 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
						OR = {
							piety = -0.20
							NOT = { stability = -1 }
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 15
						clr_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.154 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
							OR = {
								piety = 0.20
								NOT = { stability = -2 }
							}
						}
						random = {
							chance = 15
							clr_country_flag = reformed_minority_event

							limit = {
								has_country_flag = reformed_minority_event

							}

								chance = 15
								clr_country_flag = reformed_minority_event

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #Generic events
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
				NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_reformed }
				reformed = -3
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			}
			clr_country_flag = reformed_minority_event
			random_list = {
				35 = { #Advisor
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										reformed = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = reformed } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.004 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.004 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.004 days = 30 random = 180 }

	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { religion = hussite } }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
				any_owned_province = {
					has_owner_culture = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
					is_core = ROOT
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
				}
				NOT = { hussite = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
					OR = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { stability = 0 }
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = 15
					clr_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.157 days = 30 random = 180 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
						OR = {
							piety = -0.20
							NOT = { stability = -1 }
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 15
						clr_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.157 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
							OR = {
								piety = 0.20
								NOT = { stability = -2 }
							}
						}
						random = {
							chance = 15
							clr_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.157 days = 30 random = 180 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
								piety = 0.60
							}
							random = {
								chance = 15
								clr_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
								country_event = { id = dg_minorities.157 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #Generic events
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
				NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hussite }
				hussite = -3
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			}
			clr_country_flag = hussite_minority_event
			random_list = {
				35 = { #Advisor
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hussite = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = hussite } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } }
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.007 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.007 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.007 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.007 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.007 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				35 = { #Trade
					if = {
						limit = {
							any_active_trade_node = {
								strongest_trade_power = {
									NOT = { tag = ROOT }
									any_owned_province = {
										has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
										check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.107 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
				}
				30 = { #Temple
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										hussite = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = hussite } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
										controlled_by = owner
									}
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.047 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.047 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.047 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = hussite value = 2 }
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.047 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = hussite value = 4 }
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.047 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	
	option = {
		name = ai_only.a
	}
}

country_event = { #311 - wahhabi Timer
	
	id = dg_minorities.311
	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d
	picture = ai_only
	
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { religion = wahhabi } }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
				any_owned_province = {
					has_owner_culture = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
					is_core = ROOT
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
				}
				NOT = { wahhabi = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
					OR = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { stability = 0 }
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = 15
					clr_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.161 days = 30 random = 180 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
						OR = {
							piety = -0.20
							NOT = { stability = -1 }
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 15
						clr_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.161 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
							OR = {
								piety = 0.20
								NOT = { stability = -2 }
							}
						}
						random = {
							chance = 15
							clr_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.161 days = 30 random = 180 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
								piety = 0.60
							}
							random = {
								chance = 15
								clr_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
								country_event = { id = dg_minorities.161 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #Generic events
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
				NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_wahhabi }
				wahhabi = -3
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			}
			clr_country_flag = wahhabi_minority_event
			random_list = {
				35 = { #Advisor
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										wahhabi = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = wahhabi } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } }
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.011 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.011 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.011 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}

								limit = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.011 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}

						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 4 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.011 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				35 = { #Trade
					if = {

							any_active_trade_node = {
								strongest_trade_power = {
									NOT = { tag = ROOT }
									any_owned_province = {
										has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
										check_variable = { which = wahhabi value = 2 }
									}
								}

country_event = { #314 - mahayana Timer
	
	id = dg_minorities.314
	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d
	picture = ai_only
	
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { religion = mahayana } }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
				any_owned_province = {
					has_owner_culture = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
					is_core = ROOT
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
				}
				NOT = { mahayana = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
					OR = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { stability = 0 }
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = 15
					clr_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.164 days = 30 random = 180 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
						OR = {
							piety = -0.20
							NOT = { stability = -1 }
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 15
						clr_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.164 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
							OR = {
								piety = 0.20
								NOT = { stability = -2 }
							}
						}
						random = {
							chance = 15
							clr_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.164 days = 30 random = 180 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
								piety = 0.60
							}
							random = {
								chance = 15
								clr_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
								country_event = { id = dg_minorities.164 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #Generic events
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
				NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_mahayana }
				mahayana = -3
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			}
			clr_country_flag = mahayana_minority_event
			random_list = {
				35 = { #Advisor
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										mahayana = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = mahayana } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } }
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.014 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.014 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.014 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.014 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 4 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.014 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				35 = { #Trade
					if = {
						limit = {
							any_active_trade_node = {
								strongest_trade_power = {
									NOT = { tag = ROOT }
									any_owned_province = {
										has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
										check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.114 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
				}
				30 = { #Temple
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										mahayana = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = mahayana } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
										controlled_by = owner
									}
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.054 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.054 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = mahayana value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.054 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {

									controlled_by = owner
								}

				NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_sikhism }
				sikhism = -3

			}

	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { religion = jain } }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = jain_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = jain_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }

					has_owner_culture = yes

					has_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
					OR = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { stability = 0 }
					}
				}
				random = {
					chance = 15
					clr_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
					country_event = { id = dg_minorities.174 days = 30 random = 180 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
						OR = {
							piety = -0.20
							NOT = { stability = -1 }
						}
					}
					random = {
						chance = 15
						clr_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.174 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
							OR = {
								piety = 0.20
								NOT = { stability = -2 }
							}
						}
						random = {
							chance = 15
							clr_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
							country_event = { id = dg_minorities.174 days = 30 random = 180 }
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
								piety = 0.60
							}
							random = {
								chance = 15
								clr_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
								country_event = { id = dg_minorities.174 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #Generic events
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
				NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_tengri_pagan_reformed }
				tengri_pagan_reformed = -3
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			}
			clr_country_flag = tengri_pagan_reformed_minority_event
			random_list = {
				35 = { #Advisor
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										tengri_pagan_reformed = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 } }
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.024 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.024 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.024 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.024 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = { check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 4 } }
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.024 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				35 = { #Trade
					if = {
						limit = {
							any_active_trade_node = {
								strongest_trade_power = {
									NOT = { tag = ROOT }
									any_owned_province = {
										has_province_modifier = center_of_trade_modifier
										check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
									}
								}
							}
						}
						country_event = { id = dg_minorities.124 days = 30 random = 180 }
					}
				}
				30 = { #Temple
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									OR = {
										tengri_pagan_reformed = 3
										NOT = { any_known_country = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed } }
									}
								}
								random_owned_province = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
										controlled_by = owner
									}
									province_event = { id = dg_minorities.064 days = 30 random = 180 }
								}
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
									has_owner_culture = yes
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.064 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
									OR = {
										culture_group = owner
										has_owner_accepted_culture = yes
									}
									controlled_by = owner
								}
								province_event = { id = dg_minorities.064 days = 30 random = 180 }
							}
						}
						20 = {
							random_owned_province = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = tengri_pagan_reformed value = 2 }
									controlled_by = owner
								}

									controlled_by = owner
								}

country_event = { #325 - nahuatl Timer
	
	id = dg_minorities.325
	title = ai_only.t
	desc = ai_only.d
	picture = ai_only
	
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { religion = nahuatl } }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
				any_owned_province = {
					has_owner_culture = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
					is_core = ROOT
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 2 }
				}
				NOT = { nahuatl = 2 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = nahuatl_minority_event

		set_country_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_event
		#Preferred events
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_minority_event
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = minority_scapegoat } #Once per ruler
				any_owned_province = {
					has_owner_culture = yes
					has_owner_religion = yes
					is_core = ROOT
					is_city = yes
